thread.section_title: Premium Mortgage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premium Mortgage | premiummortgage.com
thread.title: Shawn

author: Shawn
title: Shawn
text: I couldn't express how pleased I am to have used Premium Mortgage Corporation for my mortgage loan provider. My wife and I went through a bankruptcy a few years ago and were not expecting such a smooth and easy process to close on our new home. Extremely fast turnaround time once we got all our paperwork together. The staff was outstanding and very accommodating in working with us. The paperwork request were not overbearing in the least. The staff also were available any time for my endless question about the process. I strongly recommend anyone looking for a mortgage provider to use these guys!
